data.lyric:
[ti:Yebba’s Heartbreak (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake/YEBBA]
[al:Certified Lover Boy (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Yebba's Heartbreak (Explicit) - Drake/YEBBA
[00:00.23]Lyrics by：James Francies/A. Smith
[00:00.46]Composed by：James Francies/A. Smith
[00:00.70]How much better can I show my love for you
[00:05.37]
[00:05.93]Than say "I do I do I do"
[00:09.51]
[00:16.65]I do I do I do
[00:19.53]
[00:24.50]You may not know right where you're going but
[00:29.06]I do I do I do
[00:31.78]
[00:32.52]And all the times you wasn't chosen well I'll make it up to you
[00:40.16]
[00:40.72]All of the feelings you're not showing
[00:44.32]
[00:45.08]When your river's overflowing mmm
[00:49.38]
[00:50.85]It's the truth swear to you
[00:54.03]I do I do I do I do I do
[00:58.57]
[01:03.67]And all that you are I do
[01:06.94]
[01:11.20]My single line of stars in noon
[01:15.10]
[01:18.64]Reflection of the very moon I do
[01:24.06]
[01:25.89]I do I do I do
[01:30.44]
[01:36.36]Show my love for you
[01:38.24]
[01:43.11]Can I show my love for you
[01:45.83]
[01:51.07]Can I show my love for you
data.trans:
[ti:Yebba’s Heartbreak (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake/YEBBA]
[al:Certified Lover Boy (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.23]//
[00:00.46]//
[00:00.70]我如何才能更好地向你表达我的爱意
[00:05.37]
[00:05.93]而不是说着我愿意
[00:09.51]
[00:16.65]我愿意
[00:19.53]
[00:24.50]你也许不知道你该何去何从
[00:29.06]但是我知道
[00:31.78]
[00:32.52]一直以来你备受冷落 我会用心补偿你
[00:40.16]
[00:40.72]当你泪流满面时
[00:44.32]
[00:45.08]你并未流露出所有感情
[00:49.38]
[00:50.85]这是事实 我向你发誓
[00:54.03]我愿意
[00:58.57]
[01:03.67]你所有的样子 我都欣然接受
[01:06.94]
[01:11.20]你是我正午时分出现在天际的那一行星辰
[01:15.10]
[01:18.64]月亮皎洁的倒影 我愿意
[01:24.06]
[01:25.89]我愿意
[01:30.44]
[01:36.36]向你表达我的爱意
[01:38.24]
[01:43.11]我能否向你表达我的爱意
[01:45.83]
[01:51.07]我能否向你表达我的爱意
